taptap.text: TapTap is a community and platform designed for you to find new things around video games to fall in love with.

confirm_email.text1: Keep your account secure and enjoy a whole new way to discover superb games.
confirm_email.content_title: Your new hub to superb games
confirm_email.content_text3: Participate in exclusive closed betas only available through TapTap
confirm_email.content_text2: Engage with your community whether it be with other gamers or the developers themselves
confirm_email.content_text1: Discover new games that we personally curate just for you
